title: Calvin quote
content:
Photo by Y. Trooley - Font is Action Man from [http://www.shyfoundry.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013180321/http:/www.shyfoundry.com/ "http://www.shyfoundry.com/")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013180321im_/http:/typophile.com/files/actionsplat_6028.jpg)
author: fontplayer

comments.content: Wow, cool quote. It doesn't sound like John Calvin, though.
In the event you don't really know, it is from Calvin and Hobbes cartoon strip.
Now that I think about it I see a great deal of similarity between Calvin and Ayn Rand.
Calvin was a little more misunderstood.
